Posted By: Shadoflaam (8/15/2012 10:31:12 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
- They can't reprint Sliver Queen since the card is on the "Reserved List", i. e. a list of cards that WotC doesn't want to reprint, ever.  
  
- "Legendary" does not equal "good"  
  
- I'd also expected to see some new Art on the Overlord.  
  
- Now to the Card:  
It's tutoring Ability is great in late game. Too bad you can't take over your opponents creatures when you have Crystaline or Ward Sliver out. Wins the Mirror Match, Antisliver-Sliver.
posts.html:
- They can't reprint Sliver Queen since the card is on the "Reserved List", i. e. a list of cards that WotC doesn't want to reprint, ever.

- "Legendary" does not equal "good"

- I'd also expected to see some new Art on the Overlord.

- Now to the Card:
It's tutoring Ability is great in late game. Too bad you can't take over your opponents creatures when you have Crystaline or Ward Sliver out. Wins the Mirror Match, Antisliver-Sliver.

Posted By: Casord (3/17/2010 11:40:21 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Do you know why I love slivers?   
They are great fun bringers  
They have poison and blades and wings  
They are legions and queens and kings  
They have overlords and can tutor up their kin  
They just swarm and grow if you let them begin  
So don’t be afraid of my one-armed friend  
They have poultice dudes with them to mend  
They have acid and fungus and wakes of flame  
They will just keep growing till I win the game  
With fury and hides full of gems or crystal skin  
A shifting sliver lets me swing for the win.  
Aura shards and vindicate and psionic entity  
And mistform beasts to take your identity  
Reflex, roots, shadows and sedge  
Toxin, two heads, victual, vampiric and sledge  
Barbed and armored, watcher and ward  
No matter which, each is a lord  
Haste, trample, firebreathing, first strike  
Flanking, buffs, provoke and psych  
Regenerate, shroud, draw and lifelink  
Frenzy, mill, reach and blink  
Shade, mana, shadow and reach  
Flying shadow, protection and leech  
But do you know the best thing of my army’s twin... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)

Posted By: Shadoflaam (8/15/2012 10:31:12 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
@asskicker123456789  
How exactly would you equip [Runed Stalactite](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Runed Stalactite) to your opponents' creatures? I mean, I guess that would be a novel use for [Magnetic theft](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Magnetic theft), but you'd get a maximum of 4 shots with it, wasting up to 5 slots in your deck(equipment + 4 copies of magnetic theft). Using [Amoeboid Changeling](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Amoeboid Changeling) accomplishes the same thing, as many times as you can untap him, he's tutor-able with Overlords search ability, AND he gets all the bonuses from your slivers.
posts.html:
@asskicker123456789
How exactly would you equip Runed Stalactite to your opponents' creatures? I mean, I guess that would be a novel use for Magnetic theft, but you'd get a maximum of 4 shots with it, wasting up to 5 slots in your deck(equipment + 4 copies of magnetic theft). Using Amoeboid Changeling accomplishes the same thing, as many times as you can untap him, he's tutor-able with Overlords search ability, AND he gets all the bonuses from your slivers.

posts.post_content:
@Omega137

posts.post_content: How about [Unnatural Selection](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Unnatural Selection)? Not only does it provide easy creature stealing, but If you're playing EDH multiplayer, Unnatural Selection is also a great multiplayer tool, since you can buff other players' creatures with your slivers at instant speed.
